main event: Three military observers on Shemya Air Force Station in Alaska sighted a variable-shaped object that changed colors from red to green to white at 2-second intervals for over 30 minutes.
interesting points: The object appeared to move in a square pattern, sometimes moving up and down, and a bright flash similar to a camera flash was observed.
The object was observed for two periods, first for 38 minutes and later for 3 minutes, as it disappeared and reappeared due to clouds.
A Navy P3V aircraft on routine patrol was asked to search the area but did not observe anything unusual.
This sighting was similar to a previous UFO report from King Salmon Air Force Station on October 19th, where a single object exhibiting the same color-changing behavior was observed.
The King Salmon sighting was analyzed as potentially being an astronomical observation, and the Shemya sighting was also concluded to be consistent with an astronomical object.
sighted object: A variable-shaped object that changed colors from red to green to white
